Name: Don't Look Back
About the game: Don't Look Back is a VR Horror, Puzzle solving game. Compared to other common VR games, we have developed a NEW movement system. Instead of standing or moving in a limited area, the Don't Look Back uses a unique method. With this new movement system, we can now move around in a much larger place and most importantly, we WONâ€™T GET DIZZY anymore!! Now, with a much wider area, come on and explore, solve the puzzles and GET SCARED!
